ios.checkIfSignInError: (function() { var element = document.getElementById('auth-error-message-box');             if (element != null && element.innerHTML !== null)             {return element.getElementsByClassName('a-list-item')[0].innerText;} else {             return ''}})()
ios.getSignInPromptType: (function() { var element = document.getElementById('ap_email_login');             if (element != null && element.innerHTML !== null)             { return 'emailId'}             else {var element = document.getElementById('ap_password');             if (element != null && element.innerHTML !== null) {             return 'pwd'} else {             return 'other'}             }})()
ios.checkIfCaptchaScreen: (function() { var element = document.getElementById('auth-captcha-guess');             if (element != null && element.innerHTML !== null)             {return 'captcha'} else {              return null}})()
ios.getOldestPossibleYear: (function() {var listOfYears = document.getElementById('report-year-start');             var oldestYear = 0;             for (i = 0; i < listOfYears.options.length; i++) {             if(!isNaN(listOfYears.options[i].value) && (listOfYears.options[i].value < oldestYear || oldestYear ==0))             { oldestYear = listOfYears.options[i].value;}             } return oldestYear })()

android.checkIfSignInError: (function() { var element = document.getElementById('auth-error-message-box');             if (element != null && element.innerHTML !== null)             {return element.getElementsByClassName('a-list-item')[0].innerText;} else {             return null}})()
android.getSignInPromptType: (function() { var element = document.getElementById('ap_email_login');             if (element != null && element.innerHTML !== null)             { return 'emailId'}             else {var element = document.getElementById('ap_password');             if (element != null && element.innerHTML !== null) {             return 'pwd'} else {             return 'other'}             }})()
android.checkIfCaptchaScreen: (function() { var element = document.getElementById('auth-captcha-guess');             if (element != null && element.innerHTML !== null)             {return 1} else {              return null}})()
android.getGenerateReportScript: javascript:             document.getElementById('report-type').value =  "$ Constants.AMAZON_REPORT_TYPE $";             document.getElementById('report-month-start').value =  "$ generateReport.startMonth $";             document.getElementById('report-day-start').value =  "$ generateReport.startDay $";             document.getElementById('report-year-start').value =  "$ generateReport.startYear $";             document.getElementById('report-month-end').value =  "$ generateReport.endMonth $";             document.getElementById('report-day-end').value =  "$ generateReport.endDay $";             document.getElementById('report-year-end').value =  "$ generateReport.endYear $";             document.getElementById('report-confirm').click()
android.getOldestPossibleYear: (function() {var listOfYears = document.getElementById('report-year-start');             var oldestYear = 0;             for (i = 0; i < listOfYears.options.length; i++) {             if(!isNaN(listOfYears.options[i].value) && (listOfYears.options[i].value < oldestYear || oldestYear ==0))             { oldestYear = listOfYears.options[i].value;}             } return oldestYear })()
